text: General Idriss Déby Itno (; June 18, 1952 - April 20, 2021) was a Chadian politician. He became President of Chad in 1990. He won six presidential elections. == Assassination == On 20 April 2021, Déby was killed while commanding his army against rebels calling themselves FACT in the north of Chad during the Northern Chad offensive, at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:African Union chairpersons Category:Deaths by firearm Category:Heads of state of Chad
title: Idriss Déby
